name: Pintos - A simple operating system
info: Pintos is a simple OS framework for the 80x86 architecture. I implemented basic support for kernel threads, loading and running user programs, a file system, and virtual memory.

name: Stanford Computer Science Research
info: Tested a new language for implicit dataflow parallelism. Achieved a 20x reduction of run time by running parallel computations on GPUs using CUDA.

name: SpikeStats - Statistics for Spikeball
info: SpikeStats provides you and your friends with all relevant statistics for your roundnet games. Just add a game result and we do the rest.
